game.name: Mira and the Mysteries of Alchemy
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: After making a big mistake while trying to craft a potion at the alchemy university, the apprentice alchemist Mira finds that she has exposed herself to an elixir that made fundamental changes to her body. Now she must go in search of the ingredients in order to craft the antidote.

Now she must go in search of the ingredients in order to craft the antidote.
